participant_1.background:
I am a financial analyst for a brewery.
I have been to 7 countries in europe and 3 countries in asia.
I have been married for 6 years.
I like to go to the casino on weekends.
I have tried 35 different types of beer in my lifetime.

participant_2.background:
My mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.
I pray to god for my family every morning.
I always put my left sock on first.
I have a condition that prevents me from going to high altitudes.
Spiders scare the life out of me.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! What about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a financial analyst for a brewery.
That sounds like a fun job! I've always loved beer.
It is! I get to try all sorts of different beers, and I get to travel all over the world for work.
That's awesome! I'm jealous.
I've been to seven countries in Europe and three countries in Asia.
That's amazing! I've only ever been to one country outside of the United States.
You should travel more! It's so much fun to see new places and meet new people.
I know, I know. I'm trying to save up some money so I can go on a big trip someday.
That's great! Where do you want to go?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to Europe or Asia.
Europe and Asia are both amazing places to visit. I'm sure you'd have a great time.
Thanks! I'm sure I would too.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the casino on weekends. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
I love video games too! What's your favorite game?
My favorite game is probably Skyrim. I love the open world and the freedom to explore.
Skyrim is a great game! I've put so many hours into it.
Me too! I've lost track of how many times I've played through it.
So, what do you like about it so much?
I love the world building. It's so immersive and detailed. I also love the combat and the character customization.
I agree, the world building is amazing. And the combat is really fun.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the gym, play basketball, and read.
I like to go to the gym too. I'm not very good at basketball, but I like to play it. And I love to read.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of books, but I especially like fantasy and science fiction.
I love fantasy and science fiction too! I'm reading a really good fantasy series right now.
What's it called?
It's called "The Stormlight Archive" by Brandon Sanderson.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch movies, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
I like to do those things too! I'm a big fan of movies and video games. And I love hanging out with my friends.
Me too! I think we're going to get along great.
